 THE ACCIDENT

Whoa!

they'll sue us, man.
 Wow.

hoặc họ sẽ khởi kiện.

¿Cree que pueda pasar?

Bless us, please, little Paula.
 -I can't believe they all are still here. -Give us your blessing.

WHAT DID THE VIGIN TELL YOU?

ĐỨC MẸ ĐÃ NÓI GÌ?

-Well… -Father, let's cut to the chase.

to be able to send it to the Vatican

Phải rồi.
 Cô còn chọn sẵn trang phục để chụp ảnh với Giáo hoàng nhỉ?

pa:
for your photo with the Pope.
 -Fabián. - This wasn't a miracle.

and luckily she survived.

With your attitude,

en: Sí, claro.

NARCOTICS ANONYMOUS

Really calm.
